backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining user data structures, access control, storage mixins, and registration/login logic with automatic initialization of per-user state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, affected files, components, and test references for recent UI and import-flow enhancements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of concise summaries for all frontend files, describing component behavior, UI layouts, hooks, and page functionality.
frontend/GO_LIVE.md: Guide outlining prerequisites, checklist items, and steps for deploying the application to the Internet Computer mainnet.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining color variables, dark mode overrides, and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up metadata, icons, manifest, root container, and service worker registration.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest configuring app name, icons, display mode, theme colors, and metadata for installation behavior.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker that caches static assets, cleans old caches, and serves cached or network responses depending on request type.
frontend/QA_APPOINTMENTS_ID_REGRESSION_T: QA test plan validating appointment edit/delete correctness using stable IDs across all schedule views and scenarios.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, profile setup, tab navigation, and global providers.
Displays an appointment with actions for calling, WhatsApp reminders, editing, deleting, and adding to patients.
frontend/src/components/AppointmentDialo: Dialog for creating or editing appointments with form handling, contact import, and submission logic.
frontend/src/components/AppointmentFeedb: Provides WhatsApp feedback request actions with validation and preview dialog.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Bottom navigation bar allowing tab switching between schedule, patients, leads, and settings.
frontend/src/components/ContactImportRev: Dialog for reviewing and editing imported contact data before use.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header showing clinic info, sync status, user menu, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/LeadCard.tsx: Renders a compact lead card with call/WhatsApp actions, follow-up info, rating, and delete/edit controls.
frontend/src/components/LeadDialog.tsx: Dialog for creating or editing leads, including contact picker integration, date fields, and form submission logic.
frontend/src/components/PatientCard.tsx: Displays a patient profile card with avatar, contact actions, area info, and edit/delete/appointment options.
frontend/src/components/PatientDialog.ts: Form dialog for adding or updating patients with image capture/upload, contact import, and notes.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Forces initial profile setup by collecting username and clinic name and saving them via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppFeedback: Shows a preview of a generated WhatsApp feedback message and lets the user confirm sending it.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity, reinitializing on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendAwareSync.t: Hook that polls the backend, compares timestamps with cached data, and invalidates React Query caches when newer backend data exists.
frontend/src/hooks/useContactPicker.ts: Provides a wrapper for the Contact Picker API and returns selected name and mobile number with structured error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Creates and manages an Internet Identity authentication context, handling login flow, stored identities, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useLastSync.ts: Tracks and formats the last successful data sync time based on React Query cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Schedules browser notifications or fallback alerts for upcoming appointments, requesting permission when needed.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data including appointments, patients, leads, and user profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useSyncStatus.ts: Monitors React Query fetch states and reports whether any data queries are currently syncing.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color themes, dark mode variables, scrollbar styling, and global transitions.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility functions for merging class names and formatting dates or bigint timestamps into 12â€‘hour time strings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that initializes React, React Query, and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/LeadsTab.tsx: Leads management tab showing sorted leads, loading states, and an add/edit dialog.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen using Internet Identity with loading states and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/PatientsTab.tsx: Patients tab with search, list display, loading states, and an add/edit patient dialog.
frontend/src/pages/ScheduleTab.tsx: Schedule tab showing today, tomorrow, and upcoming appointments with edit support and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsTab.tsx: Settings tab for editing clinic profile, syncing data, exporting, and PWA installation prompts.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: TypeScript interfaces defining Appointment, Patient, and Lead data shapes.
frontend/src/utils/phone.ts: Provides a function to normalize phone numbers by removing whitespace.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash-based), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL.
frontend/src/utils/whatsappFeedback.ts: Generates a predefined WhatsApp feedback message, validates mobile numbers, and builds or opens WhatsApp feedback URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, container settings, and registering typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the project's schema version, architecture notes, known issues, generated assets, and existing feature definitions for the McDerma app.
